title: Visual Transition Pedagogy-Based Education for Conceptual Database Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental relational database concepts and foundational knowledge of ERD (Entity-Relationship Diagram)
context.additional_context: Intensive workshop format for pre-service/in-service teachers utilizing visualization techniques at the syntax level of the TSSL model

learning_goals: Learners can understand the four-stage structure of the TSSL model and visualize hierarchical transitions when designing database schemas.
Learners can represent the incremental transformation process between ERD and relational schemas using visual diagrams with three or more stages.
Learners can convert complex requirements into conceptual models comprising five or more entities and relationships.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
